src:
YouTube Music 熄芒離線播歌！點樣可以免費試用四個月YouTube Premium
07 Nov 2019, 07:00 by 熱話
全新音樂串流服務 YouTube Music 正式在港推出，用戶可在Android 、iOS 平台下載，或經網頁瀏覽器開啟。新音樂串流服務提供無廣告、背景播放、下載及熄芒離線收聽音樂和觀看影片的嶄新進階功能。除YouTube Music App外，Google同時推出Youtube Premium服務，推廣期內，4款手機用戶更可免費試用四個月。
撰文：Smart ED編輯部  ｜ 圖片：新傳媒資料室
YouTube Music App 音樂串流服務設有免費版及付費版本
YouTube Music App設有免費版及付費版本，免費版本在播放間會有不同廣告，也不可以背景播放，另一關App就自動斷聲。付費版本則標榜無廣告，最大賣點在於音樂／影片間可以自由切換，而 YouTube 影片又可以音訊方式下載至手機之中離線播放。
另同時推出的YouTube Premium服務則除了提供全YouTube影片無廣告、可以讓用戶下載 YouTube 影片離線觀看外，亦同時包含YouTube Music Premium服務，亦晰每月多付10元即可無廣告下播放影片、音樂。
延伸閱讀：電腦＋音樂串流平台＋手機月費 優惠整合懶人包 （持續更新）| 網民熱話
延伸閱讀：【SOGO Thankful Week 2019】崇光感謝祭11月減價必搶貨品＋信用卡購物優惠

4款手機用戶可免費試用四個月YouTube Premium

香港用戶享有 YouTube Music Premium 一個月免費試用。
Samsung Galaxy S10、Note10、Tab S6 和 Tab S5e 用戶專享 YouTube Premium 四個月免費試用，當中包括 YouTube Music Premium，盡情感受全新無縫影音娛樂體驗！
推廣期由即日起直至另行通知。
此優惠不適用於目前已訂閱 YouTube Premium 或 YouTube Music Premium的客戶。
除非在試用期結束前取消訂閱，否則系統將自動在試用期結束後會自動續約並收取相關訂閱費用。
優惠期直至 2020 年 2 月 29 日。（受有關條款約束）

text:
YouTube Music goes out and sings offline! Try to try YouTube Premium for four months for free
07 Nov 2019, 07:00 by hot words
New music streaming service YouTube Music is officially launched in Hong Kong and can be downloaded on Android, iOS, or via a web browser. The new music streaming service offers new advanced features for no-advertising, background playback, downloading and extorting offline music and watching movies. In addition to the YouTube Music App, Google also launched the Youtube Premium service. During the promotion period, 4 mobile phone users can try it for free for four months.
Written by: Smart ED Editorial Department | Photo: New Media Reference Room
YouTube Music App music streaming service is available in both free and paid versions
The YouTube Music App comes with a free version and a paid version. The free version will have different ads in the play room, and the background will not play. The other app will automatically break. The paid version is advertised as no ads, the biggest selling point is that music/video can be switched freely, and YouTube videos can be downloaded to the phone for offline playback.
In addition to the YouTube Premium service, which offers full YouTube videos without ads, allowing users to download YouTube videos for offline viewing, it also includes YouTube Music Premium service, and also pays $10 per month to play videos without ads. music.
Extended reading: computer + music streaming platform + mobile phone monthly fee Concession integration lazy package (continuous update) | Internet users hot words
Further reading: [SOGO Thankful Week 2019] Sogo Thanks for the November price reduction, you must grab the goods + credit card shopping discount

4 mobile users can try YouTube Premium for free for four months

Hong Kong users have a one-month free trial of YouTube Music Premium.
Samsung Galaxy S10, Note10, Tab S6 and Tab S5e users enjoy a four-month free trial of YouTube Premium, including YouTube Music Premium, for a new seamless audio and video entertainment experience!
The promotion period will be from now until further notice.
This offer is not available to customers who are currently subscribed to YouTube Premium or YouTube Music Premium.
Unless you cancel your subscription before the end of the trial period, the system will automatically renew and charge the subscription fee after the trial period ends.
The promotion period is until February 29, 2020. (subject to the relevant terms)
